Articles.Content:
I get crashes based on the following error:

mono.dll caused an Access Violation (0xc0000005)

in module mono.dll at 001b:10106e5e.

Any ideas n cause and/or solution? his happens on multiple installs and version 0.24.2 and 0.25. 32 bit

I am running a lenovo laptop, winxp 32 bit.

I have the following mods:

NEAR

kolonization

Deadly reentry

KAS

Alarm clock

jointreinforrcer

procedural fairing

remote tech

Al 0.25 compatible.

Thanks : )
Please see the READ FIRST sticky.

Crash log output:

https://www.dropbox.com/sh/umas48zog5gbciv/AADz1qDZ9m_j_YAyO407U3x4a?dl=0

Sorry i don't have version numbers for all the mods, but I have been having this issue for a little while address several mod versions and even game versions.

You're running out of memory. You're best bet is to install Active Texture Management once it's been stabilized for KSP 0.25.

The AccessViolation hinted at this problem (it can also be other, less common issues), but the real key was OutOfMemoryException: Out of memory.
